title: Slept
content: I [slept|slept the bed] for ten hours. He [bought a new car|bought] yesterday. She [arrived|arrived the station] early. They [took the pizza|took] quickly. The baby [cried|cried the toy] loudly.
explanationZhTw:
及物動詞 (Transitive) 需要受詞；不及物動詞 (Intransitive) 不需要。
1. **slept**: 不及物，不可直接接名詞。
2. **bought**: 及物，買「什麼」？買 a new car。
3. **arrived**: 不及物，不可直接接受詞。
4. **took**: 及物，拿 pizza。
5. **cried**: 不及物，不接受詞。
explanationZhCn:
及物动词 (Transitive) 需要宾语；不及物动词 (Intransitive) 不需要。
1. **slept**: 不及物，不可直接接名词。
2. **bought**: 及物，买“什么”？买 a new car。
3. **arrived**: 不及物，不可直接接宾语。
4. **took**: 及物，拿 pizza。
5. **cried**: 不及物，不接宾语。
explanationEnUs:
Transitive verbs need an object; Intransitive verbs do not.
1. **slept**: Intransitive.
2. **bought**: Transitive.
3. **arrived**: Intransitive.
4. **took**: Transitive.
5. **cried**: Intransitive.

title: Then
content: I [woke up|woke up the clock] at 7 AM. I [washed my face|washed]. Then I [went|went the kitchen] to make coffee. I [drank the coffee|drank] slowly. My dog [barked|barked me] at the mailman.
explanationZhTw:
1. **woke up**: 不及物。
2. **washed**: 及物 (washed my face)。
3. **went**: 不及物 (went to the kitchen)。
4. **drank**: 及物 (drank the coffee)。
5. **barked**: 不及物 (barked at me)。
explanationZhCn:
1. **woke up**: 不及物。
2. **washed**: 及物 (washed my face)。
3. **went**: 不及物 (went to the kitchen)。
4. **drank**: 及物 (drank the coffee)。
5. **barked**: 不及物 (barked at me)。
explanationEnUs:
1. **woke up**: Intransitive.
2. **washed**: Transitive.
3. **went**: Intransitive.
4. **drank**: Transitive.
5. **barked**: Intransitive.

title: Someone
content: The teacher [explained the lesson|explained]. We [sat|sat the chair] quietly. A student [asked a question|asked]. Someone [sneezed|sneezed the paper] loudly. We [learned many new words|learned].
explanationZhTw:
1. **explained**: 及物。
2. **sat**: 不及物。
3. **asked**: 及物。
4. **sneezed**: 不及物。
5. **learned**: 及物。
explanationZhCn:
1. **explained**: 及物。
2. **sat**: 不及物。
3. **asked**: 及物。
4. **sneezed**: 不及物。
5. **learned**: 及物。

title: Japan
content: I [dreamed|dreamed the trip] about Japan. I [planned the itinerary|planned]. The plane [departed|departed the time] at noon. I [visited many shrines|visited]. I [stayed|stayed the hotel] near the park.
explanationZhTw:
1. **dreamed**: 不及物。
2. **planned**: 及物。
3. **departed**: 不及物。
4. **visited**: 及物。
5. **stayed**: 不及物。
explanationZhCn:
1. **dreamed**: 不及物。
2. **planned**: 及物。
3. **departed**: 不及物。
4. **visited**: 及物。
5. **stayed**: 不及物。

title: Crash
content: My computer [crashed|crashed the file]. I [restarted the system|restarted]. I [waited|waited the screen] for a long time. It [worked|worked the mouse] again. I [saved my work|saved] immediately.
explanationZhTw:
1. **crashed**: 不及物。
2. **restarted**: 及物。
3. **waited**: 不及物。
4. **worked**: 不及物。
5. **saved**: 及物。
explanationZhCn:
1. **crashed**: 不及物。
2. **restarted**: 及物。
3. **waited**: 不及物。
4. **worked**: 不及物。
5. **saved**: 及物。

title: Drove
content: He [drove|drove the sky] to work. He [parked the car|parked] carefully. He [walked|walked the street] to the office. He [saw his boss|saw] in the lobby. He [waited|waited the elevator] for five minutes.
explanationZhTw:
1. **drove**: 不及物 (在這裡驅車往...)。
2. **parked**: 及物。
3. **walked**: 不及物。
4. **saw**: 及物。
5. **waited**: 不及物。
explanationZhCn:
1. **drove**: 不及物 (在这里驱车往...)。
2. **parked**: 及物。
3. **walked**: 不及物。
4. **saw**: 及物。
5. **waited**: 不及物。
explanationEnUs:
1. **drove**: Intransitive (here: traveled by car).
2. **parked**: Transitive.
3. **walked**: Intransitive (walked to...).
4. **saw**: Transitive.
5. **waited**: Intransitive.

title: Everyone
content: I [boiled some water|boiled]. I [chopped the onions|chopped]. The soup [simmered|simmered the pot] on the stove. I [tasted the flavor|tasted]. Everyone [smiled|smiled the food] at the table.
explanationZhTw:
1. **boiled**: 及物。
2. **chopped**: 及物。
3. **simmered**: 不及物。
4. **tasted**: 及物。
5. **smiled**: 不及物。

2. **chopped**: 及物。

title: Jogg
content: I [jogged|jogged the track] for thirty minutes. I [lifted the weights|lifted]. I [stretched|stretched the sky] slowly. I [sweated|sweated the shirt] a lot. I [drank some water|drank] after.
explanationZhTw:
1. **jogged**: 不及物。
2. **lifted**: 及物。
3. **stretched**: 不及物。
4. **sweated**: 不及物。
5. **drank**: 及物。

3. **stretched**: 不及物。

2. **lifted**: Transitive.
3. **stretched**: Intransitive (here: exercise action).
4. **sweated**: Intransitive.
5. **drank**: Transitive.

title: Bloom
content: Flowers [bloom|bloom the garden] in spring. The trees [grow|grow the sky] quickly. I [picked a red rose|picked]. It [rained|rained the ground] yesterday. I [watched the sunset|watched].
explanationZhTw:
1. **bloom**: 不及物。
2. **grow**: 不及物。
3. **picked**: 及物。
4. **rained**: 不及物。
5. **watched**: 及物。

title: Email
content: I [typed the email|typed]. The printer [failed|failed the paper]. I [clicked|clicked the table] on the link. I [thought|thought the idea] about the project. I [wrote a short memo|wrote].
explanationZhTw:
1. **typed**: 及物。
2. **failed**: 不及物。
3. **clicked**: 不及物 (clicked on)。
4. **thought**: 不及物 (thought about)。
5. **wrote**: 及物。
explanationZhCn:

2. **failed**: 不及物。
3. **clicked**: 不及物 (clicked on)。

title: Swam
content: We [swam|swam the ocean] in the morning. I [dove|dove the water] from the platform. The sun [shone|shone the sand] brightly. I [built a sandcastle|built]. We [found some seashells|found].
explanationZhTw:
1. **swam**: 不及物。
2. **dove**: 不及物。
3. **shone**: 不及物。
4. **built**: 及物。
5. **found**: 及物。
explanationZhCn:

title: Movie
content: We [watched a romantic movie|watched]. The film [started|started ] at 7 PM. I [laughed|laughed the joke] at the funny scenes. The popcorn [smelled|smelled the room] delicious. We [finished the whole bag|finished].
explanationZhTw:
1. **watched**: 及物。
2. **started**: 不及物。
3. **laughed**: 不及物 (laughed at)。
4. **smelled**: 不及物 (連綴/不及物)。
5. **finished**: 及物。
explanationZhCn:
1. **watched**: 及物。
2. **started**: 不及物。
3. **laughed**: 不及物 (laughed at)。
4. **smelled**: 不及物 (连缀/不及物)。
5. **finished**: 及物。
explanationEnUs:
1. **watched**: Transitive.
2. **started**: Intransitive.
3. **laughed**: Intransitive (laughed at).
4. **smelled**: Intransitive.
5. **finished**: Transitive.

title: Hole
content: I [dug a hole|dug]. I [planted a young tree|planted]. The leaves [fell|fell the ground] in autumn. I [watered the soil|watered]. The sun [disappeared|disappeared the sky] behind clouds.
explanationZhTw:
1. **dug**: 及物。
2. **planted**: 及物。
3. **fell**: 不及物。
4. **watered**: 及物。
5. **disappeared**: 不及物。

title: Candle
content: She [blew out the candles|blew out]. We [sang 'Happy Birthday'|sang]. The music [played|played the ears] loudly. I [danced|danced ] all night. I [met many new friends|met].
explanationZhTw:
1. **blew out**: 及物。
2. **sang**: 及物 (或不及物，此處接歌名為及物)。
3. **played**: 不及物。
4. **danced**: 不及物。
5. **met**: 及物。
explanationZhCn:
1. **blew out**: 及物。
2. **sang**: 及物 (或不及物，此处接歌名为及物)。
3. **played**: 不及物。
4. **danced**: 不及物。
5. **met**: 及物。
explanationEnUs:
1. **blew out**: Transitive.
2. **sang**: Transitive (with song name).
3. **played**: Intransitive.
4. **danced**: Intransitive.
5. **met**: Transitive.

title: Book
content: I [read a thick book|read]. I [borrowed three novels|borrowed]. The librarian [whispered|whispered the secret] softly. I [sat|sat the table] for two hours. I [learned|learned the facts] about ancient history.
explanationZhTw:
1. **read**: 及物。
2. **borrowed**: 及物。
3. **whispered**: 不及物。
4. **sat**: 不及物。
5. **learned**: 不及物 (learned about)。
explanationZhCn:

2. **borrowed**: 及物。
3. **whispered**: 不及物。
4. **sat**: 不及物。
5. **learned**: 不及物 (learned about)。

title: Everyone
content: The player [kicked the ball|kicked]. He [ran|ran the goal] fast. The whistle [blew|blew the air] suddenly. We [won the match|won]. Everyone [cheered|cheered the team] loudly.
explanationZhTw:
1. **kicked**: 及物。
2. **ran**: 不及物。
3. **blew**: 不及物。
4. **won**: 及物。
5. **cheered**: 不及物。

title: Astronomers
content: Stars [twinkle|twinkle the dark]. The moon [rose|rose the sky] at 8 PM. Astronomers [study the galaxies|study]. A comet [passed|passed the star] through the sky. I [sighed|sighed the moon] in wonder.
explanationZhTw:
1. **twinkle**: 不及物。
2. **rose**: 不及物。
3. **study**: 及物。
4. **passed**: 不及物。
5. **sighed**: 不及物。

title: Melt
content: The snow [melted|melted the ground] slowly. I [wore a heavy coat|wore]. My hands [shook|shook the cold] from the chill. I [built a snowman|built]. The wind [howled|howled the house] all night.
explanationZhTw:
1. **melted**: 不及物。
2. **wore**: 及物。
3. **shook**: 不及物。
4. **built**: 及物。
5. **howled**: 不及物。

title: Milk
content: I [poured the milk|poured]. The steam [rose|rose the cup] slowly. I [stirred the coffee|stirred]. The spoon [clinked|clinked the glass] loudly. I [enjoyed the morning peace|enjoyed].
explanationZhTw:
1. **poured**: 及物。
2. **rose**: 不及物。
3. **stirred**: 及物。
4. **clinked**: 不及物。

title: Landscape
content: I [painted a landscape|painted]. The colors [mixed|mixed the canvas] well. I [cleaned the brushes|cleaned]. The instructor [nodded|nodded the student] in approval. I [sold my first painting|sold].
explanationZhTw:
1. **painted**: 及物。
2. **mixed**: 不及物。
3. **cleaned**: 及物。
4. **nodded**: 不及物。

title: Peak
content: We [climbed the peak|climbed]. Our hearts [beat|beat the chest] fast. The view [appeared|appeared the eye] suddenly. I [breathed the fresh air|breathed]. We [descended|descended the sky] before dark.
explanationZhTw:
1. **climbed**: 及物。
2. **beat**: 不及物 (跳動)。
3. **appeared**: 不及物。
4. **breathed**: 及物 (呼吸...空氣)。
5. **descended**: 不及物 (或及物，此處接時間介系詞為不及物用法)。
explanationZhCn:
1. **climbed**: 及物。
2. **beat**: 不及物 (跳动)。
3. **appeared**: 不及物。
4. **breathed**: 及物 (呼吸...空气)。
5. **descended**: 不及物 (或及物，此处接时间介系词为不及物用法)。

title: Prices
content: I [bought some apples|bought]. The vendor [smiled|smiled the customer] at me. Prices [increased|increased the store] again. I [carried the heavy bags|carried]. The sun [set|set the sky] early.
explanationZhTw:
1. **bought**: 及物。
2. **smiled**: 不及物。
3. **increased**: 不及物。
4. **carried**: 及物。
5. **set**: 不及物。

title: Dust
content: I [swept the floor|swept]. Dust [floated|floated the light] in the air. I [organized the closet|organized]. The window [shone|shone the light] after washing. I [relaxed|relaxed the sofa] on the sofa.
explanationZhTw:
1. **swept**: 及物。
2. **floated**: 不及物。
3. **organized**: 及物。
4. **shone**: 不及物。
5. **relaxed**: 不及物。

title: Cat
content: I [fed the cat|fed]. The cat [purred|purred the milk] loudly. I [brushed its fur|brushed]. It [slept|slept the rug] on the rug. I [took it to the vet|took].
explanationZhTw:

2. **purred**: 不及物。
3. **brushed**: 及物。
4. **slept**: 不及物。

title: Piano
content: He [plays the piano|plays]. The music [sounds|sounds the room] beautiful. He [practices|practices the time] every day. His skill [improved|improved the hand] quickly. We [applauded|applauded the song] enthusiastically.
explanationZhTw:
1. **plays**: 及物。
2. **sounds**: 不及物。
3. **practices**: 不及物 (或及物，此處單用為不及物)。

5. **applauded**: 不及物。

title: Campfire
content: We [lit a campfire|lit]. The fire [burned|burned the water] all night. We [grilled marshmallows|grilled]. I [coughed|coughed the smoke] from the smoke. We [laughed|laughed the joke] around the fire.
explanationZhTw:
1. **lit**: 及物。
2. **burned**: 不及物。
3. **grilled**: 及物。

content: I [checked my luggage|checked]. The plane [landed|landed the runway] safely. I [met my sister|met]. She [arrived|arrived the gate] from London. We [walked|walked the car] to the exit.
explanationZhTw:

2. **landed**: 不及物。

content: I [played the game|played]. My character [died|died the monster] twice. I [battled a dragon|battled]. The score [increased|increased the screen] rapidly. I [won the first level|won].

title: Speech
content: I [prepared the speech|prepared]. The meeting [lasted|lasted the table] two hours. I [negotiated a better deal|negotiated]. The deal [failed|failed the money] eventually. I [returned|returned the sky] home tired.
explanationZhTw:
1. **prepared**: 及物。
2. **lasted**: 不及物 (持續多久)。
3. **negotiated**: 及物。
4. **failed**: 不及物。
5. **returned**: 不及物。

title: Monday
content: I [studied the textbooks|studied]. The exam [occurred|occurred the room] on Monday. I [answered all questions|answered]. Time [passed|passed the watch] quickly. I [passed the course|passed].
explanationZhTw:
1. **studied**: 及物。
2. **occurred**: 不及物。
3. **answered**: 及物。
4. **passed**: 不及物 (時間流逝)。
5. **passed**: 及物 (通過考試)。
